availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James T. Smith (Harrison County, Kentucky, cooper.)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer. Married to Mary Marshall Smith in Harrison County, Kentucky, on June 28, 1847. Father of Martha E. Smith, Samuel Smith, Nancy Smith, William B. Smith, Mollie Smith, Elizabeth H. Smith, and George Smith. Cooper in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 591.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Buena Vista District, p. 99A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 227.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #004542906.
